contest-event.event-date:
June 18, 1960 D Verwood Contest (Section 1)
Verwood Contest (Section 1) 210 Own Choice Test Piece Contest Verwood Entertainment Contest verwood-contest-section-1
None
Recreation Ground, Verwood, Dorset 1st Annual Contest. Two previous contests had been run under the auspices of the Wessex BBA.
March Contest: 1 Highcliffe 2 Handley 3 City of Oxford 4 Wincanton 5 Salisbury 6 Alderholt 7 Southsea W Woodfalls Juniors
Hymn Contest: 1 Alderholt 2 City of Oxford 3 Wincanton 4 Southsea 5 Salisbury 6? Woodfalls Juniors? 7 Handley 8 Wincanton? or Woodfalls Juniors?
The annotation on the programme giving the hymn results is rather confused, showing 7 placings against 8 bands, including 7th and 8th places, but not 6th. Woodfalls Juniors are specifically noted as withdrawn for the march, the results for which are recorded in the same table.
British Bandsman of 25/6/1960 shows winners of section 1 as Woodfalls Silver (C.A.Kingshott) then states - 'All the bands entered were present, but the Woodfalls players did not compete in the March section as they left immediately after playing in section 2 to give a programme at a garden fete 7 miles away, and returned to win the hymn tune section and section 1.
British Bandsman shows march result as - 1st Southsea 88 pts, 2nd City of Oxford 85, 3rd Handley 82. Hymn tune as Woodfalls uniors 81pts, 2nd City of Oxford 80, 3rd Handley 79.
May 24, 2013, 10:17 a.m. April 16, 2015, 8:54 p.m.
1 Woodfalls Concert Brass Cliff Kingshott In Switzerland
2 City of Oxford Silver Band Nobby Challis Beethoven's Works [arr. W. Rimmer]
3 Luckett's Travel (Southsea) Frederick S. Monk Labour and Love
4 Handley Silver D. Judd Indian Summer
Unknown Result Salisbury City [Wiltshire] C. Hill Neapolitan Suite
Unknown Result Wincanton Silver Band R. W. Gilham Neapolitan Suite
Withdrawn Alderholt Silver Horace Grey Songs of Wales
